name: 陳文輝
objective: This course is designed to give a graduate-level student the methodologies, mathematics, and algorithms in machine learning. The topics of the course are expected to cover linear models, kernel methods, graphical models, mixture models, and other classical statistics. Students entering the class should fully participate and ought to have required knowledge of probability, statistics, and algorithms.
